summary: Called themselves masters of Thu\'um, while their clothes were not suitable for them. Now, it is going to change.
descriptionHtml:
Adds the Greybeards\' Robes enchantment of shout cooldown and makes them light armor.

Can be obtained legally now, one set is in the wardrobe in High Hrothgar.

Report any bugs or troubles you encounter

NOTE: Be careful, as they are in High Hrothgar, the have to be stolen, so don\'t commit a crime having them in inventory, or you will lose them.
author: thepitchforkoffate
